page.title: 14Village Life. Its Advantages
page.content: Yesterday we went in the hall to say what we liked and disliked about living in a village.We all wrote things on pieces of paper.Then we talked about them.We chose the best ones and voted for them like this. {32% Nature walks and fresh air.}Wild animals to look at.The quietness of the countryside . {17% You know your way round.}Villages are small and you know everybody! {15% It is quiet and peaceful,}You don't get lorries, only trains and planes. {12% Not much traffic.}You don't get noisy,fast students whizzing around. {10% Nice views.} {8% Big house and gardens.}You can camp and grow flowers. {7% Lots happening.}You don't get bored.
